Class AbstractInstanceProvider<R extends Instance<T>,T extends InstanceTemplate>

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configured, InstanceProvider<R,T>, ResourceProvider<R,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractComputeProvider, AbstractDatabaseServerProvider

    public abstract class AbstractInstanceProvider<R extends Instance<T>,T extends InstanceTemplate>
extends AbstractResourceProvider<R,T>
implements InstanceProvider<R,T>
    Abstract base class for instance provider implementations.
